articles.author: Andrew Howard, Adam Wren
articles.title: Indiana House releases draft congressional map that could net Republicans 2 seats - Politico
articles.description: The proposed map still faces a number of obstacles in order to pass.
articles.content: State House Speaker Todd Huston has consistently said his caucus could pass the new map, and Speaker Mike Johnson huddled with lawmakers this weekend in what was described by one person briefed on th… [+2436 chars]
